content:
TITLE: Complete React Image Crop Component Example DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive example showing how to implement the ImageCrop component in a React application. It includes component initialization, props configuration, and handling the crop event with a callback function. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import React, {Component} from 'react' import {render} from 'react-dom' import ImageCrop from 'react-image-crop-component' import 'react-image-crop-component/style.css' class Demo extends Component{ constructor(){ super() this.onCropped = this._onCropped.bind(this) } render(){ return (
) }, _onCropped: function (e) { let image = e.image let image_data = e.data } }); render(, document.getElementById('app')); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing React Image Crop Component (ES6) DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the ImageCrop component using ES6 import syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import ImageCrop from 'react-image-crop-component'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing React Image Crop Component Styles (ES6) DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the required CSS styles using ES6 import syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import 'react-image-crop-component/style.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing React Image Crop Component (CommonJS) DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the ImageCrop component using CommonJS require syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` var ImageCrop = require('react-image-crop-component'); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing React Image Crop Component Styles (CommonJS) DESCRIPTION: Example of importing the required CSS styles using CommonJS require syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` require('react-image-crop-component/style.css'); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing React Image Crop Component with NPM DESCRIPTION: Command to install the react-image-crop-component package using NPM package manager with the save flag. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` npm install react-image-crop-component --save ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing React Image Crop Component with Yarn DESCRIPTION: Command to install the react-image-crop-component package using Yarn package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/exelban/react-image-crop-component/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: sh CODE: ``` yarn add react-image-crop-component ```
